metadata.name: Impersonator
metadata.description: Impersonator is an open source protocol that allows users to log in to dapps as any Ethereum address via WalletConnect, iFrame, or Browser Extension without needing private keys. It enables users to easily check dapp dashboards and view how whales are using dapps like Aave and Uniswap.

metadata.name: Impersonator
metadata.description: Impersonator is an open source protocol that allows users to log in to dapps as any Ethereum address without needing to input private keys, and provides a variety of features such as being able to view dapp dashboards on any device, and track the activity of whales on various dapps.
